title: Re-store side by side screen images as in previous design
body: The old format of showing up to 8 screen shots side by side would give a user a better feel for the app as a whole. The new single view at a time may let you display a landscape image on the pc store but on the phone it comes up squished in the center of a portrait format picture - so that doesn't buy you anything. If the app is a windows phone only app - cater to it.. instead of this one size shoe fits all. Not sure what the labels under the images do - they don't show up on the web page.
